description:
Changes in Version 1.0.6: Added a feature to remember the last panel that was used.
Changes in Version 1.0.5: Added user option to stop playback by shaking device.

Tired of the clutter of canned soundboard apps that have some sounds you want and a lot of sounds you don't?  Wouldn't you rather just have all *your* favorite movie lines, sound effects, drum kits, your own inside jokes, etc. on your own *custom* soundboard? 

Then get Custom Soundboard!  

Download the free app, gather your sound files in 22KHz stereo or mono .wav format, and go to http://bodhisoft.blogspot.com/p/custom-soundboard.html for setup directions.  Connect your Pre to your computer as a USB drive, edit the app configuration file as directed on the support site, and upload it with your sound files to the Pre.  You can create a massive 16 panels of 16 sounds each, without tedious on-device editing.  Many features & soundboards are on the way.  Trade, mix, and tweak soundboard files with other users.  

Bonus: We include a 'board with clips from the famous YouTube "iPhone 4 vs. HTC EVO" vid, with permission from the folks at www.tinywatchproductions.com!  (Disclaimer: This 'board contains occassional profanity.)  

BodhiSoft will not knowingly distribute copyrighted material without permission of the copyright holder, so don't ask.  You can record anything you want for personal use through your sound card.

Contact the developer at custom.soundboard@gmail.com.
